scripts.docs:dev: cd docs && bun i && bun run dev
scripts.docs:build: cd docs && bun i &&  bun run build
scripts.typecheck: bun run typecheck:typescript && bun run typecheck:python
scripts.ci: bun run lint && bun run docs:build
scripts.lint: bun run codespell && bun run lint:python && bun run lint:typescript
scripts.lint:python: cd python && uv sync --all-extras --dev && uv run ruff check . && uv run pyright .
scripts.lint:typescript: cd typescript && bun i && bun run lint
scripts.fix: bun run fix:python && bun run fix:typescript
scripts.fix:python: cd python && uv run ruff check --fix .
scripts.fix:typescript: cd typescript && bun i && bun run fix
